meanings.definition: Located on a higher floor of a building.
meanings.sent1: The upstairs room has a nice view of the street.
meanings.sent2: My bedroom is upstairs in our house.
meanings.sent3: The upstairs neighbors have a noisy parrot.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like an upstairs attic, full of forgotten memories.
meanings.sent5: The upstairs area felt like a secret hideaway.

meanings.definition: To or on a higher floor of a building.
meanings.sent1: I need to upstairs to grab my jacket.
meanings.sent2: She always upstairs to check on her plants.
meanings.sent3: The cat loves to upstairs and explore the rooms.
meanings.sent4: His thoughts upstairs to the top floor of his mind.
meanings.sent5: The music upstairs through the house, filling every corner.
